sentences.sentence: AIM: To explore the chemical changes in compatibility of Radix Bupleuri with Radix Paeoniae Rubra.
sentences.translation: 前言：目的：研究柴胡和赤芍配伍后的成分变化。

sentences.sentence: Bayberry (Myrica rubra) leaf blight is one of the important diseases occurring on bayberry in hunan province.
sentences.translation: 杨梅叶枯病是湖南省杨梅的主要病害之一。

sentences.sentence: Objective To study the rules of lochia rubra and draw normal pattern chart of postpartum lochia prospectively.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨产后恶露变化规律，绘制恶露变化模式图。
